$400.00 delivered. Note that SGC mislabeled the card. It is not a thin paper variety. Check or money order only. Ed Hans; PO Box 307; Buffalo, NY 14207. New York residents must add sales tax. As Always "I'll take it" trumps ongoing negotiations, etc. Please reply via email [url]edhans@monkberry.com[/url] . Thank you for visiting my website.
